Hazel and her comrades follow.

  Nightlight:

  "Sure"said kindly the f=
emme but inside her she felt fear"Follow me 
  please" she started to walk =
towards the corritor that leaded to 
  quarters' section "I guess that you'=
re tired and you and your friends 
  want to rest..."


  --- In nbwrpg@y..=
., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
  > Hazel: No!
  > 
  > Hazel s=
miles and walks up to Nightlight, looking her right in the 
  optics.
  > 
=
  > Hazel: I think this tour is done...Show me to my quarters...I want 
  t=
o be ALONE....
  > 
  > Hazel warm smile takes a turn of evil as her optics=
 narrow.
  > 
  > Hazel: Understand? I need my privacy...You lead the way.
=
  > 
  > Hazel steps backwards twice, away from Nightlight and waits for 
 =
 Nightlight to lead the way. Hazel's comrades stare coldly at 
  Nightlight=
...
